verses.roman:
saṅkīrtana-pravartaka śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya
saṅkīrtana-yajñe tāṅre bhaje, sei dhanya

synonyms: saṅkīrtana-pravartaka—the initiator of congregational chanting; śrī-kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saṅkīrtana—of congregational chanting; yajñe—by the sacrifice; tāṅre—Him; bhaje—worships; sei—he; dhanya—fortunate.
translation: Lord Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya is the initiator of saṅkīrtana [congregational chanting of the holy name of the Lord]. One who worships Him through saṅkīrtana is fortunate indeed.
